select File_No, Vehicle_Id, Allocated_on, Allocated_By, Updated_by, Switched_On, isAllocated, Remark
from transportallocation where File_No=:File_No and isAllocated = 0;

select sd.File_No, sd.Registration_No, sd.First_Name, sd.Last_Name, sd.Father_name, sd.Gender, sd.DOB, sd.Enroll_No, sd.Course_Id, sd.Branch_Id, sd.Semester, sd.Academic_Year, sd.Batch_Id, sd.Section_Id, sd.Session_Id, sd.Shift_Id, sd.Centre_Id, sd.Lateral, ta.Vehicle_Id, vd.Capacity
from studentdetail sd join transportallocation ta on sd.File_No = ta.File_No join vehicledetail vd on ta.Vehicle_Id = vd.Vehicle_Id where ta.isAllocated = 1 and ta.Vehicle_Id = :Vehicle_Id
